markdown:
<title level="1" right="Setting Article" pfs="">[Following of the Broken Tusk](/Articles.aspx?ID=53)</title>

**Source** [Pathfinder #175: Broken Tusk Moon](/Sources.aspx?ID=112) pg. 66

Few beings alive know the land and its secrets better than these hardy hunter-gatherers. The story of the Broken Tusks is one of faith, bravery, and sacrifice.
name: Following of the Broken Tusk
